content.rendered:
Every year since 2014, Suntory has released a limited edition version of its award winning Yamazaki whisky. Blended by the company’s master blender Shinji Fukuyo, the limited editions are intended to show off what Suntory can do. Already collector’s items, these bottles are sure to become rare as time passes.
We at dekantā thought it was only fitting to give our customers a chance to get not just one, but the entire collection of Yamazaki limited edition bottles, 2014, 2015 and the 2016 version. This is as good as things can get!
The Yamazaki Limited Edition 2014 was released for duty-free purchase only. It is a limited edition of the award-winning Japanese single malt and earned Gold at the 2007 International Spirits Challenge, along with a Double Gold at the 2005 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. A safe buy if ever there was one.
The Yamazaki Limited Edition 2015 is, if anything, even better than the 2014, with sweet, smooth, and complex flavours. This is a must try for all fans of quality whisky.
Finally, we have the Yamazaki Limited Edition 2016 – yet another masterpiece! Bottled at 43% ABV, the 2016 edition is a blend of young single malts, matured in American oak casks, Bourbon barrels, European oak barrels, Sherry and Port Wine casks. Some of it has been aged for over 20 years.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Suntory
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Weight: 6 Kg
